message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that. How about $125?
I'm getting close, Bob! I can do $128, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit away. How about $126?
I'm almost there, Bob! I can do $127, but that's my final offer.
I'm not going to get any lower than $125, that's my final offer. Please let me know if you can meet me there.
I'm really close to accepting your offer, Bob! But I'm still a bit short. How about we meet at $126? It's my final offer.
I'm not going to get any closer than $125, that's my final offer. If you can't meet me there, I'll have to look elsewhere.
